name: Dungeon run (MaxShein)
description:
It's a simple game where two players fight monster, loot chests and explore dungeon. Due to lack of time I only made one really small map. In the future, dungeons will be generated randomly.

Control:

Pause/Inventory: ESC
Right-click on a slot: Interactions window
Dragging a slot: moving it around

Player1: 
Movement: WASD
Jumping: Space
Interact/Pick up items: F
attack with Q and (for some weapons) E

Player2: 
Movement: Arrow keys
Jumping: Right Control
Interact/Pick up items: Right Shift
attack with Mouse (Left and right button)

Scroll-like items are upgrades.
